Pull out the bone for me.
Later, if I get food, I will repay your kindness.
The wooden sparrow heard this, put its mouth on it, and pulled with all its strength, then it was able to remove the bone.
At that time, the lion king sought food the next day, killed many herds of beasts,

The Buddha told MaudgalyÄyana,
At that time, the lion king,
used this verse to repay the wooden sparrow, saying:
I am the king of lions, killing is our family business.

Since you did not measure yourself, you escaped from my fangs and difficulties.
You were able to escape from my mouth, this kindness is unforgettable.
At that time, the wooden sparrow,

He replied to the lion:
Although I am a small bird, I recognize kindness and do not begrudge my life.

If he can be a little more magnanimous and show some generosity,

At that time, the lion king killed the herd of beasts and ate to his heart's content.

Now I leave one of your eyes - can this kindness be forgotten?

From this, each of you should rest and not create karmic conditions again.
The lion king is now the Bodhisattva Yongzhi.
